CustomField.formula:
TEXT(IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( SchedStartTime - (8/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( SchedStartTime - (8/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), 12, VALUE( MID( TEXT( SchedStartTime - (8/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( SchedStartTime - (8/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ))
& ':' & Right('0' & TEXT(VALUE( MID( TEXT( SchedStartTime - (8/24) ), 15, 2 ) )), 2)
& ' ' & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( SchedStartTime - (8/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" )
